mapper.sql: SELECT RNO, ID, TYPE, STRAT_TIME, END_TIME, USE_CNT, RESERVE_STATE FROM RESERVE_INFO
mapper.select: WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY RNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE_INFO(RNO, ID, TYPE, STRAT_TIME, END_TIME, USE_CNT, RESERVE_STATE) VALUES((SELECT rno FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(rno), 0) + 1 AS rno FROM RESERVE_INFO) as A), #{id}, #{type}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, (SELECT use_cnt FROM (SELECT IF(COUNT(*) >=1, MAX(use_cnt) +1, 0) AS use_cnt FROM RESERVE_INFO WHERE type= #{type}) as B), #{reserve_state})
